class.sql: select "NUMBER","NAME",SEX,SEX_VALUE,DORM_CODE,COME_DATE,OUT_DATE,HOLD_BEGIN,HOLD_END,OUT_TYPE,OUT_TYPE_VALUE,"EXCEPTION",DETOX_END,IMPRISON_LIMIT,IDENTITY_ID from T_JC_DETOX_INFO where (ALREADY_OUT='N' OR ALREADY_OUT is null) <#if identity?? && identity!= ''> AND IDENTITY_ID =:identity </#if> <#if userName?? && userName!= ''> AND "NAME" like '%${userName}%' </#if> <#if userNumer?? && userNumer!= ''> AND "NUMBER" = :userNumer </#if> <#if OUT_DATE?? && userSex!= ''> AND SEX = :userSex </#if> <#if outDateStart?? && outDateStart!= ''> AND (to_date(OUT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=to_date(:outDateStart,'yyyy-mm-dd')) </#if> <#if outDateEnd?? && outDateEnd!= ''> AND (to_date(OUT_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')<=to_date(:outDateEnd,'yyyy-mm-dd')) </#if> <#if exceptionTypeSql?? && exceptionTypeSql!= ''> AND ${exceptionTypeSql} </#if> <#if waitOrNoSql?? && waitOrNoSql!= ''> AND ${waitOrNoSql} </#if>

select "NUMBER","NAME",SEX,SEX_VALUE,DORM_CODE,COME_DATE,OUT_DATE,HOLD_BEGIN,HOLD_END,OUT_TYPE,OUT_TYPE_VALUE,"EXCEPTION",DETOX_END from T_JC_DETOX_INFO where (ALREADY_OUT='N' OR ALREADY_OUT is null) <#if dormCode?? && dormCode!= ''> AND DORM_CODE = :dormCode </#if> <#if userNumer?? && userNumer!= ''> AND ("NUMBER" = :userNumer OR IDENTITY_ID=:userNumer) </#if>

select "NUMBER","NAME",SEX,DORM_CODE,COME_DATE,OUT_DATE,OUT_TYPE,OUT_TYPE_VALUE,EXCEPTION from T_JC_DETOX_INFO where OUT_TYPE_VALUE='unnormal' AND ALREADY_OUT='N' AND ((substr(OUT_DATE,0,8) in (${thisWeek})) OR (to_date(substr(OUT_DATE,0,8),'yyyy-mm-dd') < to_date(:nowDay,'yyyy-mm-dd'))) <#if dormCode?? && dormCode!= ''> AND DORM_CODE = :dormCode </#if> <#if userNumer?? && userNumer!= ''> AND "NUMBER" = :userNumer </#if>

select "NAME","NUMBER",SEX,SEX_VALUE,BIRTH,POLITICAL_STATUS,POLITICAL_STATUS_VALUE,HOUSE_ADDR,HOUSE_ADDR_VALUE,NATIONALITY_VALUE,PROCESS_STATE, HOUSE_DETAIL_ADDR,EDUCATION,IDENTITY_ID,WORK_ADDR,WORK,WORK_VALUE,HOLD_END,MANAGE_TYPE_VALUE,"POSITION",EDUCATION_VALUE,DETOX_BEGIN, SPECIAL_INDENTITY,IDENTITY_TYPE,IDENTITY_TYPE_VALUE,SPECIALTY,SPECIALTY_VALUE,EMPHASIS_PERSONER_VALUE,SPECIAL_INDENTITY_VALUE,OUT_PLACE_VALUE, DORM_CODE,DETOX_LIMIT,DETOX_LIMIT_VALUE,DETOX_END,OUT_DATE,OUT_REASON,OUT_REASON_VALUE,BRIEF,KS_USER_ID,IMPRISON_LIMIT,OUT_DOC_STATE from T_JC_DETOX_INFO where 1=1 <#if userNumber?? && userNumber!= ''> and ("NUMBER"=:userNumber OR IDENTITY_ID=:userNumber) </#if> <#if prisonId?? && prisonId!= ''> and DORM_CODE=:prisonId </#if>
select NUMBER,NAME from T_JC_DETOX_INFO where NUMBER=:userId
update T_JC_DETOX_INFO set NAME = :userName where NUMBER = :userId
insert into T_FCF_OUTDETOX_INFO t (select * from T_JC_DETOX_INFO tjc where tjc."NUMBER"=:userNumber)
select count("NUMBER") as TOTAL from T_JC_DETOX_INFO where (ALREADY_OUT='N' OR ALREADY_OUT is null) <#if waitOrNoSql?? && waitOrNoSql!= ''> AND ${waitOrNoSql} </#if>

select "NAME","NUMBER",SEX,SEX_VALUE,BIRTH,POLITICAL_STATUS,POLITICAL_STATUS_VALUE,HOUSE_ADDR,HOUSE_ADDR_VALUE,NATIONALITY_VALUE,PROCESS_STATE,OUT_TYPE, HOUSE_DETAIL_ADDR,EDUCATION,IDENTITY_ID,WORK_ADDR,WORK,WORK_VALUE,HOLD_END,MANAGE_TYPE_VALUE,"POSITION",EDUCATION_VALUE,DETOX_BEGIN,ORIGIN_VALUE, SPECIAL_INDENTITY,IDENTITY_TYPE,IDENTITY_TYPE_VALUE,SPECIALTY,SPECIALTY_VALUE,EMPHASIS_PERSONER_VALUE,SPECIAL_INDENTITY_VALUE,OUT_PLACE_VALUE, DORM_CODE,DETOX_LIMIT,DETOX_LIMIT_VALUE,DETOX_END,OUT_DATE,OUT_REASON,OUT_REASON_VALUE,BRIEF,KS_USER_ID,IMPRISON_LIMIT,BASE_COFIRM_STA,OUT_DOC_STATE from T_JC_DETOX_INFO where (ALREADY_OUT='N' OR ALREADY_OUT is null) <#if ksId?? && ksId!= ''> and KS_USER_ID=:ksId </#if>

insert into T_JC_DETOX_INFO (NUMBER,--人员编号 NAME,--姓名 OTHER_NAME,--别名 SEX,--性别 SEX_VALUE,--性别value BIRTH,--出生日期 ETHNIC_GROUP,--民族 ETHNIC_GROUP_VALUE,--民族value POLITICAL_STATUS,--政治面貌 POLITICAL_STATUS_VALUE,--政治面貌value NATIONALITY,--国籍 NATIONALITY_VALUE,--国籍value HOUSE_ADDR,--户籍所在地 HOUSE_ADDR_VALUE,--户籍所在地value HOUSE_DETAIL_ADDR,--详细地址 MANAGE_TYPE,--人员管理类别 MANAGE_TYPE_VALUE,--人员管理类别value EMPHASIS_PERSONER,--重口人员 EMPHASIS_PERSONER_VALUE,--重口人员value IDENTITY_ID,--证件号码 IDENTITY_TYPE,--证件类型 IDENTITY_TYPE_VALUE,--证件类型value IDENTITY,--身份 IDENTITY_VALUE,--身份value WORK_ADDR,--工作单位 POSITION,--职务 SPECIALTY,--专长 SPECIALTY_VALUE,--专长value DORM_CODE,--监室号 DETOX_LIMIT,--戒毒期限 DETOX_LIMIT_VALUE,--戒毒期限value DETOX_BEGIN,--戒毒开始日期 DETOX_END,--戒毒结束日期 HOLD_DAY,--拘留天数 HOLD_BEGIN,--拘留开始日期 HOLD_END,--拘留结束日期 BRIEF,--简要案情 COME_DATE,--入所日期 COME_REASON,--入所原因 COME_RESON_VALUE,--入所原因value OUT_DATE,--出所日期 PROCESS_STATE,--出所流程状态 OUT_REASON,--出所原因 OUT_REASON_VALUE,--出所原因value OUT_PLACE_VALUE,--出所去向value MARRIAGE,--婚姻状况 MARRIAGE_VALUE,--婚姻状况value ORIGIN,--籍贯 ORIGIN_VALUE,--籍贯value EDUCATION,--文化程度 EDUCATION_VALUE,--文化程度value SPECIAL_INDENTITY,--特殊身份 SPECIAL_INDENTITY_VALUE,--特殊身份value WORK,--职业 WORK_VALUE,--职业value PICTURE_BYTE,--图片二进制 OUT_TYPE,--出所类型 OUT_TYPE_VALUE,--出所类型value PROCESS_TIME,--出所流程确认时间 PICTURE_STATE,--人像对比状态 PICTURE_TIME,--人像对比确认时间 OUT_DOC_STATE,--出所单上传状态 OUT_DOC_TIME,--出所单上传时间 EXCEPTION,--异常原因 UPDATE_TIME) values (${values})
select ${showField} as SHOW_SEL,"NUMBER","NAME",IDENTITY_ID from T_JC_DETOX_INFO where 1=1 <#if queryCon?? && queryCon!= ''> and ${showField} like '%${queryCon}%' </#if>

select "NAME" as SHOW_SEL,"NUMBER","NAME",IDENTITY_ID from T_JC_DETOX_INFO t where 1=1 <#if queryCon?? && queryCon!= ''> and ((GETHZPY.GETHZPYCAP(t."NAME") like '${queryCon}%') OR (UPPER(GETHZPY.GETHZFULLPY(t."NAME")) like '${queryCon}%')) </#if>
